required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Recombinant Norovirus Bivalent (GI. 1 / GII. 4) Vaccine (Hansenula Polymorpha)
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of Recombinant Recombinant Norovirus Bivalent (GI. 1 / GII. 4) Vaccine(Hansenula Polymorpha) in Healthy People Aged Aged From 6 Months to 59 Years

lead_sponsor.agency: National Vaccine and Serum Institute, China

collaborator.agency: Lanzhou Institute of Biological Products Co., Ltd
Beijing Zhong Sheng Heng Yi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: National Vaccine and Serum Institute, China

brief_summary.textblock: Phase II clinical study will explore dose and safety, immunogenicity in 4 age groups, including 18-59 years old group, 6-17 years old group, 3-5 years old group, 6-35 months old group, with a total of 1716 subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: the incidence and severity of any adverse reactions/events within 30 minutes after each dose of vaccination
the incidence and severity of adverse reactions/events within 0-7 days after each dose of vaccination
the incidence and severity of non-collective adverse reactions/events within 30 days after each dose of vaccination
primary_outcome.description: If there is still next vaccination ，collect the incidence and severity of non-collective adverse reactions/events within vaccination interval（28 days） after vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: the incidence of SAE from the first dose of vaccination to 6 months after the full course of vaccination
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 6 months after the full course of vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Antibody titer of HBGA-blocking antibody on the 14th day after the full course of vaccination
primary_outcome.time_frame: 14th day after the full course of vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: 4-fold Seroconversion rate on the 14th day after the full course of vaccination
primary_outcome.time_frame: 14th day after the full course of vaccination

primary_outcome.measure: Antibody titer of（NoV GI.1 and GII.4 HBGA-blocking antibody）on the 14th day after the full course of vaccination
primary_outcome.time_frame: 14th day after the full course of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean Titer of（NoV GI.1 and GII.4 HBGA-blocking antibody）on the 14th day after the full course of vaccination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14th day after the full course of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Immune response（compared with before vaccination, the antibody increased by 4 times or more） rate of（NoV GI.1 and GII.4 HBGA-blocking antibody）on the 14th day after the full course of vaccination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 14th day after the full course of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Antibody titer of（NoV GI.1 and GII.4 HBGA-blocking antibody）on 90th,180th,270th,360th,540th,720th day after the full course of vaccination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 90th,180th,270th,360th,540th,720th day after the full course of vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Binding Antibody (IgG) on 90th,180th,270th,360th,540th,720th day after the full course of vaccination
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 90th,180th,270th,360th,540th,720th day after the full course of vaccination

intervention.description: Intramuscular injection of low-dose Norovirus Bivalent (GI.1 / GII.4) Vaccine in the deltoid muscle of the upper arm
Intramuscular injection of high-dose Norovirus Bivalent (GI.1 / GII.4) Vaccine in the deltoid muscle of the upper arm
Intramuscular injection of placebo in the deltoid muscle of the upper arm

facility.name: qixian Center for Disease Control and Prevention
